Title: Relates to treatment of domestic violence victims and documentation of injury and evidence
Summary: Relates to treatment of domestic violence victims and documentation of injury and evidence; requires collection and storage of evidence and prohibits agencies from charging domestic violence victims.
LawCode: Add ยง2805-z, Pub Health L; amd ยง631, Exec L
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the public health law and the executive law, in relation to treatment of domestic violence victims and documentation of injury and evidence
